name: Eye of the Beholder 2: The Legend of Darkmoon
name_original: Eye of the Beholder 2: The Legend of Darkmoon
description:
Eye of the Beholder 2: The Legend of Darkmoon is a RPG game developed by Westwood Associates. It was originally released in 1991. It was published by Strategic Simulations. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Eye of the Beholder 2: The Legend of Darkmoon on PC. The game is sold via GOG.
